page.title: 19ARTISTS
page.content: Jo Worth is a freelance artist who also teaches. She works two days a week at Taunton Art collage teaching Graphic design and illustration. The rest of the time she works at home in her studio illusrating childrens books and televison progammes. She has illusrated twenty childrens books in the last twelve years. She particularly enjoys drawing children in old fashion costumes. Sometimes she is commisiound to paint butterflies and many other things. Two other artists who live at Greenham Barton, in a 13th century semi fortified house, paint in oils, acrylic and water colours. Mr.Willis usualy paints ships, old and new and has prints taken from his paintings to frame and sell. Mrs. Willis draws and paints land scapes and shares her skills by helping adults to paint for plesure.
